=========================

Permit Applications
-------------------

Please select from the documents below for the appropriate application.  
["CLICK HERE FOR DOCUMENTS NEEDED TO SUBMIT WITH APPLICATION"](https://www.beachcitytx.us/ATTACHMENTS%20FOR%20PERMIT%20SUBMISSION.pdf)





![Doc app](https://www.beachcitytx.us/revize/plugins/document_center/_images_/app.png)

Document Center
---------------

The Document Center provides easy access to public documents. Click on one of the categories below to see related documents or use the search function.

Search for file name:
---------------------




Categories always sorted by seq (sub-categories sorted within each category)
  
Documents sorted by HEADER in Ascending Order within category

RESET

### Applications2 documents

* [Permanent Electric Application.pdf](https://www.beachcitytx.us/Document%20Center/Applications/Permits/PERM%20ELECT%20Application%202022.pdf)

  document Header
  Permanent Electric Application.pdf
* [Temporary Electricity Application](https://www.beachcitytx.us/TEMP%20ELECT%20Application%202022.pdf)

  document Header
  Temporary Electricity Application

### Affidavit To The Public2 documents

* [Affidavit To The Public](https://www.beachcitytx.us/Affidavit%20to%20the%20Public%20COBC.pdf)

  document Header
  Affidavit To The Public

  STANDARD FORM
* [Affidavit To The Public](https://www.beachcitytx.us/Affidavit%20to%20the%20Public%202-%20Acre%20Tracts%20of%20Land.pdf)

  document Header
  Affidavit To The Public

  OSSF Located on Two or More Tracts of Land
